topics.body:
I know people don't like it when I post touhou, but I've been reading the extended lore with the novels and manga; christ this shit is fucking dark.

On the surface:
Cute girls becoming friends living in a wonderland.

What it's actually about:
Women often with severe mental problems due to either abuse, persecution or other fucked up shit forming a sort of support clique of friends.


Examples of fucked up things in the lore:
A woman who refuse to be a genocidal murderer sealed in hell by angry people upset that she wasn't a blind homicidal racist like her job required her to be.
A woman who heard the voice of god, tries to destroy everything believing that's what she was meant to do.
A woman who mutilates her eyeball cause she's afraid of what other people will think of her.
A girl kept in a basement for a long freaking time cause she rough housing with her would instantly kill you and over time her mental stability deteriorated.
A woman whose parents were in all probability genocidal and her god is genocidal and she was in all probability saved by her friend by making her forget about them preventing her from ever actually carrying out that programming to kill people cause her god told her to and eventually learning to accept differences and becoming friends with the race she was originally told to blindly kill.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
